name: AREAX
description:
The character of the game is a student, when he left his hometown to study abroad, his mother went to a remote 

seaside tour. But when his mother returned, she was diagnosed with cancer and died two months later. Before his mother died, 

he was told that in this seaside lighthouse, there was something that his mother had left for him. In order to knowing what his

mother had left him, the character decided to go to the seaside alone to find out what her left, only to accidentally see his mother’s

soul in the lighthouse of the beach. Through the mother's memories and letter left to the character. The character slowly accepts

the fact that his mother died and understands the meaning of life.

TEST VIDEO:https://vimeo.com/650303374

The Chinese voice in the game is synthesized by synthesizer and vocoder. For details, please refer to:https://github.com/babysor/MockingBird/blob/main/README-CN.md
